remarks: Write a poset structure in terms of the proper-class poset predicate (strict less than version).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
statement:
pospo.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pospo.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
pospo.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
pospo $p |- ( K e. V -> ( K e. Poset <-> ( .< Po B /\ ( _I |` B ) C_ .<_ ) ) ) $.
